content:
jananee parishuddha-praarththanayaal naathaa!
Punyam njangalkkum-vigatharkkum nalka.

parishuddha shleehaa-nibi sahadenmaare!
Yaachippin krupaye njangalkkaayu ningal

nin sharane mrutharaam-thaathasahodararil
choriyaname moda-ppanineeren naathaa!

Susmruthi jananikkum-vishruthi siddharkkum
jeevan vigatharkkum cherppone! Sthothram

jananee parishuddha praarththanayaal naathaa!
Punyam njangalkkum-vigatharkkum nalka.
